headline.print_headline: Florida Gov. Courts Hispanic Voters With Switch
headline.main: Florida Gov. Courts Hispanic Voters With Switch

lead_paragraph: When Rick Scott made his maverick push for Florida governor four years ago, the Republican took a hard line against illegal immigration that he used to assail his main GOP rival for the job. But with a likely tight re-election campaign looming, the incumbent is making a concentrated push to win over Hispanic voters.
